mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation ( item_category, total_price, start_date, end_date, name, phone, total_discount_price, member_id, seller_id ) VALUES ( #{itemCategory}, #{totalPrice}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{totalDiscountPrice}, #{memberId}, #{sellerId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET item_category = IFNULL( #{itemCategory}, item_category ), total_price = IFNULL( #{totalPrice}, total_price ), start_date = IFNULL( #{startDate}, start_date ), end_date = IFNULL( #{endDate}, end_date ), name = IFNULL( #{name}, name ), phone = IFNULL( #{phone}, phone ), total_discount_price = IFNULL( #{totalDiscountPrice}, total_discount_price ), seller_id = IFNULL( #{sellerId}, seller_id ), cancellation = IFNULL( #{cancellation}, cancellation ) WHERE res_id = #{resId}

SELECT r.res_id, r.item_category, r.total_price, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.name, r.phone, r.total_discount_price, r.created_at, r.updated_at, r.member_id, r.seller_id, r.cancellation, p.paid_at, p.state, it.name as "iname", ig.item_img FROM reservation r JOIN payment p ON (r.res_id = p.res_id) JOIN reservation_item ri ON (r.res_id = ri.res_id) JOIN item_schedule isc ON (isc.item_schedule_id = ri.item_schedule_id) JOIN item it ON (isc.item_id = it.item_id) JOIN item_group ig ON (it.item_group_id = ig.item_group_id) ORDER BY r.start_date DESC LIMIT (#{currentPage} -1) * #{pageSize}, #{pageSize}
